paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the TTR gene, including penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: The TTR c.239C>T variant is associated with hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis.

variants.evidence_level: evidence from population frequency and association with disease
variants.additional_notes: The variant was identified most often in African populations.
key_quotes: The common TTR c.239C>T p.(Thr80Ile) variant associated with hereditary transthyretin amyloidosis was identified in 28 genomes (1%).

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in the TTR gene was reported in the paper.
